General.Name: ADD Industry Zhejiang Co Ltd
General.Description: ADD Industry (Zhejiang) CO., LTD manufactures and sells shock absorbers for vehicle suspension system in China and internationally. It offers twin-tube shock absorbers, strut cartridges, shock absorbers with spring seat, struts, airbag shock absorbers, strut assemblies, steering dampers, adjustable shock absorbers, and cabin dampers for passenger vehicles and commercial vehicles. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Yuhuan, China.
